TopicTitle: Vagani Car Manufacturers- Get Inspired- Final Challenge

Articles.Content: Umm... I think i unintentionally gave the reason to some of the plane parts being replaced in 0.25 with my commericial....

Umm... I think i unintentionally gave the reason to some of the plane parts being replaced in 0.25 with my commericial....

why? .

You see, there might have been some sort of deal with every space program, to replace some of the plane parts(0.15 Parts), with newer plane parts(0.25 SP+ parts and Mk1 Cockpit remodel) like Delta Wings, Structural Wings, and to lesser extent, Elevons. Because they either looked more modern, or, like in the commericial, more shinier.

I fixed my Aloceraptor to be 0.25 compatible (it uses flaps inside which are angled down for downward force). So I replaced those and then I realized that it was working so good, that I used my other trick where I make cars go faster without any propulsion. So now it drives at cruising 30 m/s and I think it can go faster (idk didn't test that) and it doesn't have the slight flipping problem that the old one had. Here's the download:

http://download941./9rn6ck2fdyyg/xz02xjegb4v42fd/Aloceraptor.craft

XD no problem. I'm here for the ride, if not necessarily the reward. *Cough* pun intended. And because Vagani's awesome!

I've been streaming my Mun jumps and Minmus speed tests. Instead of doing jumps I thought it was cooler to watch the thing TUMBLE . It's pretty much indestructible (other than needing to repair the wheels). A wheel popped off once when I hit the ground tilted at over 60m/s sideways and probably 15-20m/s down, but other than that it takes anything from any angle. Here's a really long hypnotic highlight vid of it. Top speed on Minmus was 27m/s after about ten straight minutes with a brick on rover throttle and time warp 4. Here's a longer and even more hypnotic video of the Minmus speed tests. Twitch booted me out of streaming at the end for some reason, but it made it to 27m/s. It was quite entertaining when I turned off SAS and made a sharp left . The thing rolls forever xD
